text:
• Influencer: Emma Thompson
            • Brand: Adairs
            • Fee: ~$3,700
            • Deliverables: 3 x Instagram post, 2 x 90-second product demo, 1 x Social media takeover, 1 x Facebook post, 3 x Pinterest pin
            • Exclusivity: 7 weeks
            • Engagement: 3 months
            • Usage: 6 months
            • Start: November 2025
